channel.title: BMI on Virtualbeck's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in BMI on Virtualbeck's Blog

item.title: weight-loss
item.description: My friends and I are having a challenge between the three of us to lose weight. We all need to drop 20 lbs in 2 months. If you don’t hit the minus 20 pound mark by Oct 24th, you have to pay $100 per pound you missed. The max one person will pay is $2000. Split to 2 winners if needed. If we all lose 20 pounds, then we are all fat losers!
